name: MIDI Controller Keyboard
description: A versatile MIDI controller keyboard with 49 keys, ideal for music production and live performance.

name: MIDI Drum Pad
description: A compact MIDI drum pad with velocity-sensitive pads and assignable controls, perfect for beat-making and triggering samples.

name: Seaboard Rise 2
description: A keyboard designed for limitless exploration of sound. Re-engineered from the multi-award-winning original to be more intuitive and powerful than ever before, RISE 2 is the new pinnacle of musical expression.

name: MIDI Keyboard Controller
description: A professional-grade MIDI keyboard controller with aftertouch and extensive control options for expressive playing and precise parameter manipulation.

name: MIDI Pad Controller
description: An intuitive MIDI pad controller with backlit RGB pads and touch-sensitive controls, designed for hands-on beat production and performance.

name: MIDI Foot Controller
description: A compact MIDI foot controller with programmable switches and expression pedal inputs, suitable for controlling effects, switching presets, and more.
